section.name: Expression step
section.p: This step allow to compute expression using the filtered alignments and a annotation file that contains genomic elements to count.

ul.li: Available: Both local and distributed mode

tr.td: The name of the counter to use (eoulsanCounter or htseq-count).
feature type (3rd column in GFF file) to be used, all features of other type are ignored.
GFF attribute to be used as feature ID

table.tr: strandedstringIf "reverse", the read has to be mapped to the opposite strand as the feature. If "yes" or "no", the read has to be mapped to the same strand as the feature or it is considered overlapping with a feature regardless of whether it is mapped to the same or the opposite strand as the feature.no

tr.td: Name of the overlap mode to use (union, intersection-nonempty or intersection-strict).
Keep or remove ambiguous cases in the count.

section.p: In local mode, use the main.tmp.dir global parameter to set the temporary directory if this step fails with a full disk error.
